name: a sinking kinda feeling.
description:
a sinking kinda feeling (feat. FLOOR BABA)

A small interactive fiction on feeling like you've completely lost
the ability to communicate with those around you.
inspired by Paul Baribeau, my depression, and Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening. 

WASD: Movement

Audio by FLOOR BABA (Twitter | Bandcamp)
Art and Design by Jake Grizzly Pierce (Twitter)
